original_text: As Jesus was walking beside the Sea of Galilee, he saw two brothers, Simon called Peter and his brother Andrew. They were casting a net into the lake, for they were fishermen.
korean_text: 갈릴리 해변에 다니시다가 두 형제 곧 베드로라 하는 시몬과 그의 형제 안드레가 바다에 그물 던지는 것을 보시니 그들은 어부라

sentences.original_text: As Jesus was walking beside Sea of Galilee
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 갈릴리 바다 곁을 걸어가실 때

sentences.original_text: They were casting a net into lake
